Posting form data

When creating a form for a user to complete, we use the POST method to secure the data that is sent to a server/database.

You need a form key to post to a Tina4 Post route. This is easy to add to into your Twig or HTML form: 


<form action="/post-route" method="POST">
   <button>Submit</button>
   {{ "reason for token" | formToken | raw }}
</form>

In code the token is also available as : 


<?php

$_SESSION["tina4:authToken"]

You can define how long a token lasts in your env file: 


TINA4_TOKEN_MINUTES=5
